languages.text: "Вы в праве сообщить префекту то, что считаете нужным, но долг обязывает меня отчитаться маршалу. Я передам ему, что Вольный Торговец взял{mf||а} тассерианцев под свою защиту — едва ли ваша воля будет обсуждаться".

traits.locale_text: "Согласен. Распоряжусь, чтобы новую партию тассерция погрузили в трюмы".

languages.text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."
languages.original_text: "Вы в праве сообщить префекту то, что считаете нужным, но долг обязывает меня отчитаться маршалу. Я передам ему, что Вольный Торговец взял{mf||а} тассерианцев под свою защиту — едва ли ваша воля будет обсуждаться".

traits.locale_text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be treated as negotiable."

"You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be treated as negotiable."

"You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

"You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

"You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

"You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

languages.text: “你有权只透露你认为有必要透露的情报，但我也有义务向元帅禀告实情。我会告诉他，行商浪人打算将塔瑟拉的居民置于{mf|他|她}的保护之下。如果我猜得没错，你的决定恐怕没有商量的余地。”
languages.original_text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

traits.locale_text: “你有权只透露你认为有必要透露的情报，但我也有义务向元帅禀告实情。我会告诉他，行商浪人打算将塔瑟拉的居民置于{mf|他|她}的保护之下。如果我猜得没错，你的决定恐怕没有商量的余地。”

languages.text: 「あなたは必要と考える情報を総監と共有する権利がありますが、私は将帥に報告を行う義務があります。ローグトレーダーがタッセーラ人を保護下に置いたことを伝えます。あなたの意志が交渉の余地があるものとして扱われるとは到底思えません」
languages.original_text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは必要と考える情報を総監と共有する権利がありますが、私は将帥に報告を行う義務があります。ローグトレーダーがタッセーラ人を保護下に置いたことを伝えます。あなたの意志が交渉の余地があるものとして扱われるとは到底思えません」

languages.text: «Es usted libre de compartir con la prefecta cualquier información que estime oportuna, pero yo estoy obligado a informar al mariscal. Le haré saber que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha decidido amparar a los thasserianos. Dudo mucho que su voluntad se considere como algo negociable».
languages.original_text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted libre de compartir con la prefecta cualquier información que estime oportuna, pero yo estoy obligado a informar al mariscal. Le haré saber que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha decidido amparar a los thasserianos. Dudo mucho que su voluntad se considere como algo negociable».

languages.text: "Gerekli gördüğünüz her türlü bilgiyi prefektle paylaşma hakkına sahipsiniz, bense Miralay'a rapor vermekle yükümlüyüm. Ona Hür Tacir'in Thasseralıları himayesi altına aldığını söyleyeceğim. İradenizin pazarlık konusu olacağını pek sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

traits.locale_text: "Gerekli gördüğünüz her türlü bilgiyi prefektle paylaşma hakkına sahipsiniz, bense Miralay'a rapor vermekle yükümlüyüm. Ona Hür Tacir'in Thasseralıları himayesi altına aldığını söyleyeceğim. İradenizin pazarlık konusu olacağını pek sanmıyorum."

languages.text: « Vous avez le droit de partager toutes les informations que vous jugerez nécessaires avec la préfète, mais il est de mon devoir d'en alerter le maréchal. Je lui expliquerai que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a pris les Thasseriens sous son aile. Il est peu probable que votre volonté soit jugée négociable. »
languages.original_text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez le droit de partager toutes les informations que vous jugerez nécessaires avec la préfète, mais il est de mon devoir d'en alerter le maréchal. Je lui expliquerai que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a pris les Thasseriens sous son aile. Il est peu probable que votre volonté soit jugée négociable. »

languages.text: "Ihr könnt der Präfektin alle Informationen mitteilen, die Ihr für erforderlich haltet, aber meine Pflicht verlangt, dass ich dem Marschall Bericht erstatte. Ich werde ihm sagen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Thasseraner unter {mf|seinen|ihren} Schutz gestellt hat. Ich kann wohl kaum erwarten, dass Euer Wille verhandelbar ist."
languages.original_text: "You are entitled to share any information you deem necessary with the prefect, but I am duty-bound to make a report to the Marshal. I will tell him that the Rogue Trader has taken the Thasserians under {mf|his|her} protection. I can hardly expect your will to be taken as negotiable."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt der Präfektin alle Informationen mitteilen, die Ihr für erforderlich haltet, aber meine Pflicht verlangt, dass ich dem Marschall Bericht erstatte. Ich werde ihm sagen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Thasseraner unter {mf|seinen|ihren} Schutz gestellt hat. Ich kann wohl kaum erwarten, dass Euer Wille verhandelbar ist."
